Articles.Content:
Now, I've only ever tested it with ships that have been re-rooted, but that's pretty much the only case you'd use it. Point is, the Merge Function is buggy.

http://imgur.com/jIcPi97,1EfgXBl,5avBu2X,kRXOyle,S3hDhT0,MCEW0J4
It works if the merging vessel has an open node to attach to the current vessel (which also needs an open node) or if its root is surface attachable, it's a bit like the sub-assembly thing really
